name: Doki Doki On Air
overview: Doki Doki on Air: Voice actresses Haruna Ikezawa, Sakura Tange & Manami Komori participate in this interactive radio program where popular seiyu perform their vocal utterances and stylings to the hilt. The player in the game takes the role of a radio programmer that have to make the daily programming chosing the different programs (that have each of them a different duration) and have to make that the programming match the total hourtime for that day. At the beginning of the game he can choose one of the 3 different girls to be the radio announcer. Before making the programming he can call people to make them appear in any of the programs, talk to the radio people, etc. When all the programming is done he can watch the program and sometimes ask the girls question to help her in the program.
